formattedAddress: 443 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 443 W 22nd St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Martha and Myra are absolutely disgusting human beings the way they treat the residents of the building is heartbreaking, Myra talks down to them and treats them badly she threw medication at my family instead of giving it to them properly. I’ve called the department of health so many times but when SHE gets there (they always send the same lady) she just stays in the office laugh and chat and nothing ever gets done about the way our family members are treated. Myra and Martha definitely need to be humbled in my opinion and I hope Karma comes back to haunt them.

originalText.text: Was hired by this company thru United Staffing Solutions. Been with the agency for 4 1/2 years before being hired by Freddie Fleming to cover for a superintendent who's about to get surgery. Worked with them for 5 months during the height of the pandemic. Got all the COVID shots required, flu shot, COVID test every Wednesday, came to work on time, didn't disrespect the staff or employees, did impeccable work, went far & above my means to do projects only for them to just out the blue fire me. No warning. No explanation. Not only did the manager fired me from the site but she also got the agency to not find me any work. Called the agency to find out that the director lied about why they chose to not keep me. The fact that she lied to get rid of me was way more satisfying than my anger for her getting rid of me. 5 stars for the building superintendent Juan & Myra. Negative 1 star for Martha B.

originalText.text: While you're around London terrasse gardens, come to W 22nd street to enjoy Frederic Fleming house and all other entrances in these street!
